definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: and in the grounds around gardens, bowers, fountains and shady nooks in profusion.
sentences.chinese: 花園，涼亭，噴泉圍繞的場地以及納涼處，應有盡有。

sentences.english: Is you enjoys the cool air the summer vacation best choice.
sentences.chinese: 是您納涼避暑的最佳選擇。

sentences.english: Children from the ger districts cool off in the polluted Tuul River.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古包區的孩子們正在已被污染的圖爾河中納涼。

sentences.english: We set up an umbrella to cool ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我們撐起一把雨傘納涼。

sentences.english: This summer, people flocked to the swimming pool to keep cool during the heat wave.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天，人們成羣結隊來到泳池納涼，躲避熱浪。

sentences.english: The dog's tongue hangs out for cooling.
sentences.chinese: 狗的舌頭吐出來以納涼。

sentences.english: He cooled himself in front of a fan.
"I don't believe in releasing a single and then just watching it. " - Lady Gaga to NME magazine.
sentences.chinese: 我無法相信有人發行了單曲，然後就在旁邊納涼。

sentences.english: Children cool-off in a fountain in Havana October 7, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 古巴首都哈瓦那的孩童在噴泉里納涼。

definition: Xiao Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
the multitudes come out from everywhere, emptying every alleyway (to celebrate)/the whole town turns out
to cool off in the shade

the Lantern Festival (15th of first month of lunar calendar)
